whatIs.title: What is Runic Translator Studio?
whatIs.description: Runic Translator Studio is your comprehensive online platform for runic transcription, visualization, and audio output. Supporting major runic writing systems including Elder Futhark, Younger Futhark, Anglo-Saxon Futhorc, and Medieval runes, our studio offers professional-grade tools for text-to-rune conversion, voice input/output, high-resolution exports, tattoo-safe mode, and engraving optimization. Perfect for tattoo design, tabletop gaming, handcrafting, educational demonstrations, and cosplay prop creation.

steps.title: Choose Your Runic System
steps.description: Select from Elder Futhark, Younger Futhark, Anglo-Saxon Futhorc, or Medieval runes based on your project needs and historical period preferences.

steps.title: Input Your Text

items.question: Is the Runic Translator free to use?
items.answer: Yes, our basic runic translation services are free to use for everyone.

items.question: Which runic alphabets are supported?
items.answer: We support multiple runic systems including Elder Futhark, Younger Futhark, and Anglo-Saxon runes.
